comments:
Hi, 
i use Eclipse Platform Version: 3.0.0
Build id: 200405211200.
when i try to save a jsp-file(or other) i get an Error:
Save Filed:org.eclipse.ui.texteditor.AbstractTextEditor.createSaveOperation(Z)Lo

I opened a *.jsp with the Text and the Java editor using R3.0 and could save
without any problems.

If you still see this using R3.0 or newer then please reopen with answers to the
following questions:
- with which editor do you open the *.jsp file?
- if you say "other" does this mean you can't save any file?
- anything in .log
- any other plug-ins (or examples) installed?

Bug happens in 3.0.1
SolarEclipse is installed.
I can save html and java files - just not jsp.
.log contains:

the

>I18NTextEditor.doSave
==> you need to file the bug against SolarEclipse. If they find out that it's
not a SolarEclipse bug they can file a bug report.
